feed.title: philipdefranco TikTok
feed.subtitle: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from philipdefranco

entry.title: Hamas Wasn’t Expecting America To Join The Battle #usa #israel Hamas says it didn’t expect such a strong response from the U.S. With a senior member of the group telling the financial times - “An Israeli response? Yes, we expected that but what we’re see
entry.content: Hamas Wasn’t Expecting America To Join The Battle #usa #israel Hamas says it didn’t expect such a strong response from the U.S. With a senior member of the group telling the financial times - “An Israeli response? Yes, we expected that but what we’re seeing now is the entrance of the US into the battle, and this we didn’t count on.” This alluding to how the US’ two carriers have restrained Hamas’ allies from fully entering the war with Israel as Hamas expected them to. Jordan has asked the United States to deploy Patriots in its country to bolster its defense. An anti-Semitic mob of hundreds stormed an airport and its tarmac in Russia looking for Jewish people who they claim were on a flight from Tel Aviv. Earlier in the day, the New York Times reports that hundreds gathered outside of a hotel after rumors that it was “filled with Jews”. Russia has blamed Ukraine for its own people forming antisemitic mobs.

entry.title: Israel Strikes Refugee Camp #usa #israel Israel has confirmed that it carried out an airstrike on Gaza’s largest refugee camp to kill a senior Hamas commander. The Wall Street Journal says Doctors estimate scores of civilians were killed in the strike. T
entry.content: Israel Strikes Refugee Camp #usa #israel Israel has confirmed that it carried out an airstrike on Gaza’s largest refugee camp to kill a senior Hamas commander. The Wall Street Journal says Doctors estimate scores of civilians were killed in the strike. The IDF was asked by Wolf Blitzer why they would hit the camp if they knew it had innocent refugees and civilians. And the spokesperson said: “This is the tragedy of war, wolf. We've been saying for days, move south." The Houthis have entered the conflict, according to Reuters. The Houthis, based in Yemen over a thousand miles away from Israel, say they have carried out 3 missile attacks on Israel so far. The first of these attacks was intercepted by the US navy and Saudi Arabia while the 2nd hit Egypt instead of Israel, and initial reports seem to suggest that the third attack hit Jordan by accident today.

entry.title: Israel Conducts Space Combat In A Global First #usa #israel Israel shot down a missile in space in what is the first recorded instance of space combat. With the Telegraph reporting that the missile was fired by Yemen’s Houthis, where it traveled out of t
entry.content: Israel Conducts Space Combat In A Global First #usa #israel Israel shot down a missile in space in what is the first recorded instance of space combat. With the Telegraph reporting that the missile was fired by Yemen’s Houthis, where it traveled out of the earth’s atmosphere and was intercepted by Israel’s Arrow. Israel has suspended a cabinet minister after he suggested nuking Gaza. Iran says that the US will be hit hard if it doesn’t implement a ceasefire in Gaza. Iranian proxies have continued to attack US bases. They’ve launched at least 40 attacks on America in the past 20 days with at least 45 US troops being injured according to NBC News. The US has conducted at least two airstrikes in response and is now calling on the Iraqi government to stop Iran’s proxies from further attacks. The King of Jordan says they worked with Israel to airdrop medical supplies to a hospital in Gaza. Israel says that its ground invasion has split Gaza in half and the IDF says that it expects to enter Gaza City within the next 48 hours. In an interview, a senior Hamas leader called North Korea an ally and suggested that one day they could intervene in the conflict. This comes after AP identified Hamas using North Korean supplied weapons in the October 7th attack. France has had more than a thousand anti-Semitic incidents since October 7th according to the French interior minister. Turkish police used tear gas and water cannons to stop pro-Palestinian protesters from storming an Air Force base that houses US troops according to Reuters.

entry.title: Australia & China Have Absolutely Ridiculous Meeting #australia #usa China and Australia had a meeting and their leaders were rizzing each other up. Xi told the Australian prime minister that Tasmanian devils were cute, and Albanese responded by saying t
entry.content: Australia & China Have Absolutely Ridiculous Meeting #australia #usa China and Australia had a meeting and their leaders were rizzing each other up. Xi told the Australian prime minister that Tasmanian devils were cute, and Albanese responded by saying that they weren’t as cute as Pandas. And Xi apparently said that not all Pandas are cute, citing the Kung Fu Panda movies. The two also reportedly debated wine and its quality. With Xi saying that he visited New Zealand and that the wine was good, and Albanese says he asserted that the best red wine comes from Australia. Albanese said the exchange was very warm. I heard they also sat next to each other in the booth. But so far there has been no word on if a second date will be happening.

entry.title: US Upset With Israel As It Strikes Back At Iran & Warns Hezbollah #usa #israel The US is at least mildly pissed at Israel according to Axios. Yesterday the Pentagon’s chief called his Israeli counterpart to issue a warning about trying to provoke a war w
entry.content: US Upset With Israel As It Strikes Back At Iran & Warns Hezbollah #usa #israel The US is at least mildly pissed at Israel according to Axios. Yesterday the Pentagon’s chief called his Israeli counterpart to issue a warning about trying to provoke a war with Hezbollah because the US believes that this will cause a regional war that will draw the US and several other countries into the conflict. Israel flatly denies that this conversation happened but Axios says their sources in both countries claim the call was very direct and frank. The US conducted another round of airstrikes in Eastern Syria on bases used by Iranian proxies and the http://IRGC.US Forces have been attacked 4 times by Iranian proxies since the airstrikes yesterday. There have now been at least 50 attacks on US forces since October 17th according to the Pentagon. The New York Times reported that President Biden has rejected more aggressive bombing options proposed by the Pentagon in hopes of not escalating into a war with Iran. With some now saying his hands are looking to be increasingly tied after today’s attacks. The Biden administration sent an advisor to Lebanon last week to deliver a warning to Hezbollah via Lebanon's parliament according to VOA. The warning was to not escalate the conflict. The advisor reportedly returned to America with the impression that Hezbollah wasn’t interested in an actual war, Axios alleges. Despite this, Israel and Hezbollah keep climbing the escalation ladder with each other, hoping one will give up. The White House was reportedly alarmed by two incidents that looked like they could escalate the conflict. If the Fish continues to plagiarize us, he will be struck down.
